definition: exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to imitate/model/norm/pattern
mold/die/matrix/pattern
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
manner/pattern/way/appearance/shape/classifier: kind, type

sentences.chinese: 这些小海豚长得一模一样。

sentences.english: Do you know that scientists a sheep into an .
sentences.chinese: 你知道吗，科学家复制了一头一模一样的克隆羊。

sentences.english: It was already the same technology they used for the mail.
sentences.chinese: 这和邮递所使用的方式一模一样。

sentences.english: You talk like an old man yourself.
sentences.chinese: 你说得就象那个老人一模一样。

sentences.english: The two sisters look exactly alike.
sentences.chinese: 这两姐妹长得一模一样。

sentences.english: I always confuse the sisters: they look so alike.
sentences.chinese: 我总是分不出这对姐妹，她们看上去简直一模一样。

sentences.english: This code does exactly the same thing, but with a third fewer characters.
sentences.chinese: 这段代码做了一模一样的事情，但是用了更少的字符。
玛丽和她妈妈长得一模一样。

sentences.english: You will hear the duplicate of Fuzzy's laugh.
sentences.chinese: 你将会听到几乎和富齐一模一样的笑声。

sentences.english: KOTORI :You look exactly like what I saw in that dream.
sentences.chinese: 你和我在梦你看见的神威一模一样呢。

sentences.english: They looked and performed just like the soldiers in Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 从外表上和表演上，他们都和越南的士兵一模一样。

sentences.english: ' he siad. 'He's exactly like a huge fan.
sentences.chinese: 他说道，“它和扇子是一模一样的。”

sentences.english: It`s just like the descriptions of Nessie.`
sentences.chinese: 这个东西与有关尼斯湖水怪的描述一模一样。

sentences.english: This is the same book as Mr Wang lost.
sentences.chinese: 这本书跟王先生丢失的那本一模一样。

sentences.english: They look like ladies’ red flannel drawers to me.
sentences.chinese: 我看那跟女人穿的红法兰绒衬裤一模一样。

sentences.english: The witnesses' description perfectly matches that of the car that chased me all over town.
sentences.chinese: 目击者的描述和满镇子追我的那辆车简直是一模一样。

definition: to be precisely the same/to be no different
to resemble one another/to be alike/similar
there cannot be another one like it
to resemble/similar/like/resemblance/similarity
not at all the same/substantially different
to reprint/reproduction/pirate copy/(fig.) imitation/carbon copy/clone
similar
accurate to perfection (idiom)/precise to the finest detail
entirely different/different as black and white
as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart
lit. as different as sky and earth (idiom)/fig. night and day difference/opposite extremes/a world of difference/a far cry from
to strikingly resemble
not much difference
difference/distinction/disparity
virtually the same/differing only on small points
appearance/manifestation
